resources.string: Calculate a percentage of a number
– Calculate a percentage of a number. Example: What is 25% of 200? The result is 50.
– Calculate what percentage a value represents of another. Example: What % is 50 in 200? The result is 25%.
• You can type the values and tap the \'Calculate\' button,
or simply press the check (✔) on the keyboard for faster results.
• Use the \'Copy\' button to save the result to the clipboard.
